channel.title: Making yourself an Admin on an SMF forum if you were de-modded
channel.description: I was de-modded on the forum I own and can't get into the forum settings. How do I get my admin privileges back?

item.title: Making yourself an Admin on an SMF forum if you were de-modded
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Inching Away:

Going to get my friend to host it for free. He’ll let me use his FTP for most of the stuff I’ll put on it.

That still doesn’t mean you have a domain. You’re still using crappy smfforfree

Read full topic
item.source: Making yourself an Admin on an SMF forum if you were de-modded

item.title: Making yourself an Admin on an SMF forum if you were de-modded
item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

How on earth did you get de-modded when you are the admin of your own forum? Did you give a mod too many permissions or something or did someone find a loophole and abused it.

Read full topic
item.source: Making yourself an Admin on an SMF forum if you were de-modded
